main.name: Pushpendra Singh
main.bio: Hi there! I have more than 4  years of experience as a Full Stack Developer, I possess a robust skill set in designing, developing, and maintaining web applications. Proficient in front-end and back-end technologies, I am dedicated to creating efficient and user-friendly digital experiences. Skilled at collaborating with cross-functional teams to deliver top-notch software solutions.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to be a part of the PAPA fam!

education.school: Shree Siddhi Vinayak Institute of Technology, Bareilly (UP)

work.title: Front End Developer
work.description:
• Developed and maintained web applications using React
  • Collaborate with product and design to create user-friendly and performant web application.
  • Collaborated with product and design teams to create user-friendly and high-performing web applications.
  • Worked closely with the back-end team to integrate applications with APIs.
  • Conducted code reviews to validate structures, assess security, and ensure compatibility with various browsers, devices, and operating systems.

work.title: Front End Developer
work.description:
• Designing and developing websites and platforms.
  • Collaborating with design teams to ensure intuitive user interactions.
  • Providing back-end functionality for smooth operation across different devices and browsers.
  • Developing APIs and ensuring software responsiveness and efficiency.
  • Building features with mobile-responsive design.
  • Building well-functioning databases and applications.
  • Reviewed code to validate structures, assess security and verify browser, device and operating system compatibility

testimonials.text: I have worked with many professionals throughout my journey. His work ethics are pristine, and he is easily adjustable to a given situation. His ability to go out of his way to help others has made him stand out.
Very good technical skills. Easily adjustable with new technology!
